msgSnippet: ... The easiest test you could write can use HtmlUnit to visit your JSP and make assertions about what data is shown on the page. Perhaps you could start
messageBody:
Shrikant K.S wrote:
> Hi All,
> I have one JSP page which takes some data from DB and
> display's it. Connecting to DB, getting the data and
> displaying it all are handled in jsp page itself as
> scriplets.
> Now i want to test this JSP page.
> So how can i go about this JSP page testing.
> I m new to this type of testing. I m not getting the
> exact idea. What are the technologies to be used?
>
> Any help is hightly appreciated.
> Thanks well in adavance.

The easiest test you could write can use HtmlUnit to visit your JSP and
make assertions about what data is shown on the page. Perhaps you could
start there.

http://htmlunit.sourceforge.net

Good luck.
--
